items.description: Managed financial operations across 3 firms and 15+ sites, handling accounts receivable, accounts payable, invoice entry, account assignment, distributions, inventory reconciliations, general reporting, and accounting issues, boosting efficiency by 42% through Excel automation. items.title: Investment Analysis of J.P. Morgan Chase & Co. - Major (Financial Research Project)
items.description: Assessed 15+ financial ratios (ROE, ROCE, P/E, Current Ratio) using balance sheet data under US GAAP to evaluate liquidity, profitability, identifying a 2.02 current ratio and 22% ROCE indicating financial strength. Conducted top-down and bottom-up analysis integrating market information, industry analysis, ESG evaluation, Solvency II, and reporting processes, while supporting receipt management and archiving to assess portfolio report, equity financing, and sustainable investment potential. Analysed earnings trends to forecast 12% CAGR over 5 years, supporting long-term investment decisions. Applied hypothesis testing and ratio analysis to validate investment assumptions using tools like regression, working capital modelling, and debt-equity financing.
